title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 18th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with former Trump campaign manager Corey Lewandowski about his testimony in front of the House Judiciary Committee.



Email Embed

+ Embed Code



Embed the following code on your website:



Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-FL) about the questions he asked Corey Lewandowski during his House Judiciary Committee hearing.



Email Embed

+ Embed Code



Embed the following code on your website:



Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with former governor Mike Huckabee about some culture war stories as well as Corey Lewandowski's testimony on Capitol Hill.



Email Embed

+ Embed Code

Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Sen. Josh Hawley (R-MO) about the censorship of conservative speech on Facebook and what can be done about it.

and it's Trivia Day!
